section_data.title: Marketing Data Analytics Intern
details: Optimized the ad vendor rankings in MyFitnessPal’s waterfall bidding auction by analyzing CPM and revenue trends through the use of time-series analysis after factoring in the impact of Europe’s GDPR law on UA’s ad inventory

Led requirements gathering and development of a customer segmentation tool utilized for user behavioral analytics on the world’s largest nutritional, health, and wellness social platform, MyFitnessPal with over 125M regular users

Performed exploratory data analysis and gaussian mixture modeling to identify significant predictive variables of a “heart healthy” user segment and trained a regression tree algorithm with them (bmi, activity levels, nutritional intake, etc.)

Built a data cleaning and analytics tool with a UX feature that has reduced data processing time of 3-8M records from 18+ hours to 3; it was successfully deployed and implemented during the summer to obtain 225k worth of revenue

section_data.title: Business Operations and Pharma Informatics Intern
details: Conferred with Business Systems Analyst to collect requirements from clients and identified the most fitting visualizations per their needs; created dashboards using Tableau, SQL, and Python, and publishing the products on the company server

Designed and presented automated Tableau reports based on key performance indicators (KPIs) such as write offs rate, adherence to lead time, serious injury rate and order lead time for the global head of Drug Substance of Genentech
Developed proof of concepts to test the data source compatibility and the viability of automation for various clients

section_data.title: Project Manager
details: Led a team of 6 consultants to research and benchmark novel AI algorithms used in customer service departments

Developed a proof of concept report explaining how PayPal can use existing data of users’ demographics and their UX interaction patterns to create personalized experiences on “customer help” platforms (AI chatbot, phone call, email, etc.)

section_data.title: Senior Consultant
details: Scored eBay’s SEO performance considering factors such as domain authority, backlink quality and keyword placement by trying to reverse engineer the algorithms of trusted industry SEO ranking tools using Python and Tableau

Benchmarking and quantifying current SEO performance through the search query analysis of over 100,000 URLs and looking up various keywords that correlate with product categories that eBay is interested in using Pandas
Created an algorithm for the digital ranking of each of eBay’s product categories and identify areas of potential growth

section_data.title: Software Engineer Internship
details: Experimented with different methods of data collection (manual, custom-built web scraper, third party websites) and calculated relative accuracy by comparing the number of accurate URLs to those that Google’s search currently provides

Utilized Python to find correlations between variables such as acceptance rate, federal funding, accreditations, and tuition and the difficulty of data collection for each school in order to predict factors of difficulty with data maintenance
Competitive analysis of the industry – including demographics, marketing strategy, information accuracy, and market share

section_data.title: Vice President of Development
section_data.details: Train and guide 10 new members to reach their personal, professional, and social goals
